Hello!

I'm Dan Moreno, an interactive engineer and product designer trying to learn about the future of storytelling & human computer interfaces.

Get in touch dmorenocuellar@gmail.com

Background

I'm a senior at The University of Pennsylvania in Philadelphia with a background in software engineering, management and product design. I work as a freelance product designer for Enclave and have previously interned at Snap Inc. and at Facebook. I will join Snap's Camera Platform team as a full-time engineer building augmented reality experiences in the fall of 2018.

I value creative freedom above all else, and work best in fast-paced environments that embrace prototyping as a central tenet of product development. My current interests lie in how augmented and virtual reality is redefining human-computer interaction, storytelling, and the way we consume and create content.

Outside of debugging my code you can find me reading, watching movies or playing my synth.
